Summary: Moderately large bright glowing red object
trends: There have been 43 other sightings in Lexington
There were no other sightings in Lexington on or around April 7th 2011
divs: sighting detailsi was sitting on my balcony around 9:00pm et yesterday working on facebook on my android phone. i happened to notice something from the corner of my right eye. i looked up at the sky and say a bright read glowing ball-shaped object that was moderate in size moving due east of my location. the object was moving at a slow speed from the middle of the sky to the horizon. i am a smoker, but only smoke on my balcony, never indoors, so i am constantly seeing planes pass over. this was definitely not a plane or helicopter, or anything i have ever seen before. the object seemed to flicker, then vanish as it moved toward the horizon. i was able to capture some of what i saw using the camcorder feature of my phone. the video footage can be found at *(link moved to additional evidence section--cms\sg).
